EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-10-24 Maximize Cloud Discounts in AWS & Azure - Live Demo.ES-20181017-W
EmailTemplate.subject: [Webinar] Maximizing Cloud Discounts in AWS & Azure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
I've been speaking with technologists like you to learn more about the way they manage their cloud and it's clear that balancing cost and performance is a top challenge. Some overpay while others experience slow performance due to budget constraints. This is a choice I think you shouldn't have to make. Join me on Wednesday, October 24th at 11 am ET, for our webinar "Maximizing Cloud Discounts in AWS and Azure <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]>" where I'll teach you several important ways to lower cloud bills and maximize performance in the cloud.
This 30-minute presentation <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]> will help you calculate cloud cost and deliver the best configuration to fit your workloads unique performance needs.
I hope to see you there.
All the best, Eric Wright Director of Technical Marketing, Turbonomic
PS. If you can't make it, register here anyways <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/enterprise-cloud-discounts/]]>, and we'll send you the exclusive recording afterward.
